description.narrative: ? Ensure coordination and implementation of the trade and commerce sector elements contained in the Terra Ranka plan, Guinea-Bissau's main national development document. ? Develop and support integration an ongoing dialogue between the government and development partners, focused on mobilizing resources for poverty alleviation through increased trade. ? Support the implementation of the country's Medium Term Strategy and the action of the Updated DTIS. ? Provide the needed support to operationalize the Guinea-Bissau Interministerial Committee on Commerce, and serve as its Secretariat. ? Enhance capacity development through trainings and institutional

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Commerce and Business Promotion

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
